unnormalised: Crop insurance, huh? Gotta have it, especially with unpredictable monsoons in Maharashtra. Last year, Raju lost his entire paddy crop near Nagpur. Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helped a bit, but the payout was slow. Hoping this year's better! And safer… Onam without a decent harvest would be tough, even if Amma makes the best biryani! Need that claim settled fast if things go south.
